Class Fighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • Fighter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public class Fighter
extends Sprite
    Class Fighter extends class Sprite. Has data about the fighter like their health, maximum health, damage and speed.
    Version:
    (5202018)
    Author:
    (Jane Wang)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fighter(double x, double y, double width, double height, javafx.scene.image.Image image, double speed, double maxHealth, double damage)
      constructor Fighter holds information about the fighter such as position, size of the image to display, and it's speed and health.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      method attack attacks the other fighter
      (package private) void damage(Weapon b)
      method damage lowers health after being atacked based on the damage of the weapon or enemy

      method getMaxHealth gets the max health of the fighter

      method moveLeft changes the x-velocity of the fighter so it will move left y-velocity remains the same
      void moveRight()
      method moveRight changes the x-velocity of the fighter so it will move right y-velocity remains the same

      method near checks if the fighter is close to another fighter (by 10 pixel margin at least)

      teleports back to starting position! x and y velocity become 0
